summary: This mod adds some things to the Castle Orlok mod (created by rajti15).
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds some things to the Castle Orlok mod (created by rajti15).

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All credits to rajti15 for your great mod.

Profile: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3441869
Castle Orlok: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23246

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This mod requires the Dawnguard DLC

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Change Log V1.3

- Added royal bedroom (access behind the throne)
- Access to balcony moved to the royal bedroom
- Master bedroom removed (added a bedroom to vampire brides in this place)
- Changed Mythic Dawn references to generic versions
- Now some npcs can sleep (I\'m working on the remaining)
- Minor fixes and improvements

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Change Log V1.2

- Bath room improvement (Changed location)
- Throne room improvement (Alternative passage to the main room is behind the throne)
- Modified access to throne room in upper floor
- Added secret coffins to all bedrooms in upper floor
- Bridge improvement
- Minor improvements

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Change Log V1.1

- New NPCs added
- Armory improvement
- Guard barracks moved to inside the castle in first floor
- Fixed bug where npc\'s head color not match with the skin color
- Minor fixes and improvements

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Change Log V1.0

First floor:
- Cleaned Chapel

Basement:
- Added escape route

Catacombs:
- Cleaned
- Added treasures in the main chamber
- Skelleton removed

Upper Floor:
- Added bath room
- Added new guest bedroom 
- Added mannequin to the master bedroom
- Added workroom in the secret passage of the master bedroom 
- Escape route removed (moved to basement)

Guard Tower:
- Added second floor

Everywhere:
- Fixes and improvements

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PS:
- Some changes are not compatible with the history of the castle.
- Sorry if I do not answer frequently in the comments, I\'m not good at English :(

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ENJOY!!!
author: Ecooooooooo and rajti15 originally
